/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, is flanked by towering buildings and lush greenery, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. A pedestrian bridge arches over the street, connecting different parts of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, casting a serene backdrop to the busy street below.
